                def self.custom_methods
          
      47.

                  {
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            69
            

            

                      "de_buss_und_bettag(year)" => Proc.new { |year|
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            12
            

            

            date = Date.civil(year,11,23)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            12
            

            

            if date.wday > 3
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            4
            

            

              date -= (date.wday - 3)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            
            

            

            else
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            8
            

            

              date -= (date.wday + 4)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            12
            

            

            date
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            
            

            

            },
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
            

            

                  }
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61.

            1
            

            

                def self.custom_methods
          
      537. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    537. 
            
            

            

                  {
          
      538. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    538. 
            7

                def self.custom_methods

                def self.custom_methods
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            
            

            

                  {
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            1
            

            

                      "jp_health_sports_day_substitute(year)" => Proc.new { |year|
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            24
            

            

            Holidays::Factory::Definition.custom_methods_repository.find("jp_substitute_holiday(year, month, day)").call(year, 10, Holidays::Factory::DateCalculator.day_of_month_calculator.call(year, 10, 2, 1))
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            
            

            

            },
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
            

            

            "jp_vernal_equinox_day(year)" => Proc.new { |year|
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

            day =
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            22
            

            

              case year
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            
            

            

              when 1851..1899
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            
            

            

                19.8277
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
            

            

              when 1900..1979
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            
            

            

                20.8357
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
            

            

              when 1980..2099
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            22
            

            

                20.8431
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            
            

            

              when 2100..2150
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            
            

            

                21.8510
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

              else
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
            

            

                raise IndexError.new("Out of range")
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

              end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            22
            

            

            day += 0.242194 * (year - 1980) - ((year - 1980)/4).floor
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            22
            

            

            day = day.floor
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            22
            

            

            Date.civil(year, 3, day)
          
      91.

            132
            

            

              holiday[:mday] == date.day

            29

                def self.custom_methods
          
      143.

                      "ca_victoria_day(year)" => Proc.new { |year|
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            
            

            

            date = Date.civil(year,5,24)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
            

            

            if date.wday > 1
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            
            

            

              date -= (date.wday - 1)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
            

            

            elsif date.wday == 0
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            
            

            

              date -= 6
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
            

            

            end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            
            

            

            date
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
            

            

            },
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            
            

            

            "christmas_eve_holiday(date)" => Proc.new { |date|
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            
            

            

            beginning_of_month = Date.civil(date.year, date.month, 1)
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
            

            

            (date.saturday? || date.sunday?) ? date.downto(beginning_of_month).find {|d| d if d.wday == 5} : date
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            
            

            

            },
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
            

            

            
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            
            

            

            "rosh_hashanah(year)" => Proc.new { |year|

            "georgia_state_holiday(year, month)" => Proc.new { |year, month|
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            
            

            

            beginning_of_month = Date.civil(year, month, 1)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            
            

            

            state_holiday = Date.civil(year, month, 26)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
            

            

            state_holiday.downto(beginning_of_month).find {|date| date if date.wday == 1 }
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            
            

            

            },
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            
            

            

            
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191.

      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            
            

            

            Holidays::Factory::DateCalculator.day_of_month_calculator.call(year, 11, 1, 1) + 1
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            
            

            

            },
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
            

            

            "us_inauguration_day(year)" => Proc.new { |year|
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            
            

            

            year % 4 == 1 ? 20 : nil
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
            

            

            },
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198.

      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            
            

            

            },
          
      202.

            11
            

            

            if [2,3,4].include?(date.wday)

            4

                def get_date(date)

                # Calculate day of the month based on the week number and the day of the
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
            

            

                # week.
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
            

            

                # ==== Parameters
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
            

            

                # [<tt>year</tt>]  Integer.
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
            

            

                # [<tt>month</tt>] Integer from 1-12.
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
            

            

                # [<tt>week</tt>]  One of <tt>:first</tt>, <tt>:second</tt>, <tt>:third</tt>,
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
            

            

                #                  <tt>:fourth</tt>, <tt>:fifth</tt> or <tt>:last</tt>.
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
            

            

                # [<tt>wday</tt>]  Day of the week as an integer from 0 (Sunday) to 6
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            
            

            

                #                  (Saturday) or as a symbol (e.g. <tt>:monday</tt>).
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            
            

            

                #
          
      14.

                # Returns an integer.

                class DayOfMonth

                  def call(year, month, week, wday)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            1603
            

            

                    raise ArgumentError, "Week parameter must be one of Holidays::WEEKS (provided #{week})." unless weeks.include?(week) or weeks.has_value?(week)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            1599
            

            

                    unless wday.kind_of?(Numeric) and wday.between?(0,6) or day_symbols.index(wday)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            4
            

            

                      raise ArgumentError, "Wday parameter must be an integer between 0 and 6 or one of Holidays::DAY_SYMBOLS."
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            1595
            

            

                    week = weeks[week] if week.kind_of?(Symbol)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            1595
            

            

                    wday = day_symbols.index(wday) if wday.kind_of?(Symbol)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
            

            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            
            

            

                    # :first, :second, :third, :fourth or :fifth
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            1595
            

            

                    if week > 0
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            1282
            

            

                      return ((week - 1) * 7) + 1 + ((wday - Date.civil(year, month,(week-1)*7 + 1).wday) % 7)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            313
            

            

                    days = month_lengths[month-1]
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            313
            

            

                    days = 29 if month == 2 and Date.leap?(year)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            313
            

            

                    return days - ((Date.civil(year, month, days).wday - wday + 7) % 7) - (7 * (week.abs - 1))

                  class Gregorian
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            1
            

            

                    def calculate_easter_for(year)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            74
            

            

                      y = year
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            74
            

            

                      a = y % 19
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            74
            

            

                      b = y / 100
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            74
            

            

                      c = y % 100
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            74
            

            

                      d = b / 4
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            74
            

            

                      e = b % 4
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            74
            

            

                      f = (b + 8) / 25
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            74
            

            

                      g = (b - f + 1) / 3
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            74
            

            

                      h = (19 * a + b - d - g + 15) % 30
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            74
            

            

                      i = c / 4
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            74
            

            

                      k = c % 4
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            74
            

            

                      l = (32 + 2 * e + 2 * i - h - k) % 7
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            74
            

            

                      m = (a + 11 * h + 22 * l) / 451
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            74
            

            

                      month = (h + l - 7 * m + 114) / 31
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            74
            

            

                      day = ((h + l - 7 * m + 114) % 31) + 1
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            74
            

            

                      Date.civil(year, month, day)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            1
            

            

                    def calculate_orthodox_easter_for(year)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            23
            

            

                      j_date = Julian.new.calculate_orthodox_easter_for(year)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            
            

            

                      case
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            
            

            

                      # up until 1582, julian and gregorian easter dates were identical
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            23
            

            

                      when year <= 1582
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
            

            

                        offset = 0
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
            

            

                      # between the years 1583 and 1699 10 days are added to the julian day count
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            
            

            

                      when (year >= 1583 and year <= 1699)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
            

            

                        offset = 10
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
            

            

                      # after 1700, 1 day is added for each century, except if the century year is exactly divisible by 400 (in which case no days are added).
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            
            

            

                      # Safe until 4100 AD, when one leap day will be removed.
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
            

            

                      when year >= 1700
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            23
            

            

                        offset = (year - 1700).divmod(100)[0] + ((year - year.divmod(100)[1]).divmod(400)[1] == 0 ? 0 : 1) - (year - year.divmod(100)[1] - 1700).divmod(400)[0] + 10
          
      40.

                    def calculate_easter_for(year)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            10
            

            

                      g = year % 19 + 1
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            10
            

            

                      s = (year - 1600) / 100 - (year - 1600) / 400
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            10
            

            

                      l = (((year - 1400) / 100) * 8) / 25
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            10
            

            

                      p_2 = (3 - 11 * g + s - l) % 30
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            10
            

            

                      if p_2 == 29 || (p_2 == 28 && g > 11)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            2
            

            

                        p = p_2 - 1
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            8
            

            

                        p = p_2
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
            

            

            
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            10
            

            

                      d= (year + year / 4 - year / 100 + year / 400) % 7
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            10
            

            

                      d_2 = (8 - d) % 7
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            10
            

            

                      p_3 = (80 + p) % 7
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            10
            

            

                      x_2 = d_2 - p_3
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            10
            

            

                      x = (x_2 - 1) % 7 + 1
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            10
            

            

                      e = p+x
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
            

            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            10
            

            

                      if e < 11
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            1
            

            

                        Date.civil(year,3,e + 21)
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
            

            

                      else
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            9
            

            

                        Date.civil(year,4,e - 10)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            
            

            

                      end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76.

                    def calculate_orthodox_easter_for(year)
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            39
            

            

                      y = year
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            39
            

            

                      g = y % 19
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            39
            

            

                      i = (19 * g + 15) % 30
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            39
            

            

                      j = (year + year/4 + i) % 7
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            39
            

            

                      j_month = 3 + (i - j + 40) / 44
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            39
            

            

                      j_day = i - j + 28 - 31 * (j_month / 4)
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            39
            

            

                      Date.civil(year, j_month, j_day)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            
            

            

                    end
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
            

            

                  end
          
      89.

      91.

                    def calculate(input, id, args, modifier)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65.

    69.

      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70.

      72.

            # This context builds a hash that contains {:year => [<array of months>]}. The idea is that
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
            

            

            # we will iterate over each year and then over each month internally and check to see if the
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
            

            

            # supplied dates match any holidays for the region and date. So if we supply start_date of 2015/1/1
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4.

            module Holidays
